content:
github-actions[bot] opened issue #10274:

ring is unmaintained

Details
Status unmaintained
Package ring
Version 0.17.10
URL https://github.com/briansmith/ring/discussions/2414
Date 2025-02-20

The author has announced an indefinite hiatus in its development, noting that
any reported security vulnerabilities may go unaddressed for prolonged periods
of time.

See advisory page for additional details.

pchickey closed issue #10274:

ring is unmaintained

Details
Status unmaintained
Package ring
Version 0.17.10
URL https://github.com/briansmith/ring/discussions/2414
Date 2025-02-20

The author has announced an indefinite hiatus in its development, noting that
any reported security vulnerabilities may go unaddressed for prolonged periods
of time.

See advisory page for additional details.

pchickey commented on issue #10274:

Discussion in https://github.com/briansmith/ring/discussions/2414 indicates that other maintainers are stepping up and the rustsec advisory has been withdrawn https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2025-0007.html. So, we can close this and not take action.
